name: SLICE BACK
description:
Slice an Alien invasion into sushi pieces and get the Earth back. Follow Groove and her talking hamster, Harold, into a hilarious adventure, satisfy their hunger and meet intriguing characters.

You will progress through several levels (each with its own surprises and secrets), fight powerful bosses (some of them with unexpected behaviours…) and defeat the aliens while gaining new superpowers or evolving your existing ones. You will spend most of the time melee fighting in the air, beating your enemies away, throwing them around and jumping from one to another while slicing them into small sushi pieces in this fast paced action combat side scroller with a neo pixel art aesthetic.

Key features


+ Accessible and responsive combat system:
The game is easy to play, the controls feel intuitive and you always have control over your character either on the ground or in the air.

+ Deep focus on aerial fights:
You will spend most of the time melee fighting in the air, jumping from one enemy to the next, slicing them into small sushi pieces.

+ Fight powerful bosses...
… some of them with unexpected behaviours.

+ Unlock new powers:
Eat alien sushis with tasteful soy sauce to earn new powers.

+ Explore a post-apocalyptic Earth
Follow Groove through her accidental journey.

+ Hilarious story
A not so epic quest to satisfy Groove & Harold’s hunger while accidentally becoming heroes.

+ Neo pixel art style
A pixel art style adapted to new technologies and all tastes. So, even if you’re not fond of pixel art, you might like our approach!

+ A talking hamster:
Harold the hamster, threatened us if we didn’t add him as a main feature...
